ComicInfo.Title: Notes #33; How I Spent My Summer Vacation; The Bitch That Keeps On Bitching; A Kitty Tale with a Happy Ending!; Opal Whiteley; Why I Hate Holidays
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:31:49. [CVDB164612] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:44:06. [Issue ID 170746]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A trip to California, filming the Fremont Solstice Parade, cleaning the garage, and other adventures
Midge vents about politics and television, takes Aunt Hazel to Mom's for Thanksgiving, gets a Botox gift certificate from Mom, and buys herself a VCR
Roberta rescues an abandoned cat and finds it a home
Biography of a Washington woman (1897-1992) who kept a diary from age 6, which was later published in Atlantic Monthly and made her a literary sensation.
